quotes.quote: To define is to limit.
Human sympathy has its limits.
Limit love and you limit life.
Doubt is the limit of progress.
Whatever limits us, we call fate.
All limitations are self imposed.
Your limitations create your sound.
Music has no limits of a life-span.
We are limited only by our thoughts
Death is the last limit of all things.
Belief in limits creates limited people
There is no limit to the power of loving.
Adversity tests the limit of our strength.
You never know the limit of a human being.
Beyond the limits there lies other limits.
God's love is unbounded. It has no limits.
The fears we don't face become our limits.
Adversity tests the limit of your strength.
One who fears failure limits his activities. Failure is only the opportunity more intelligently to begin again.
Once we accept our limits, we go beyond them.
Any definition which limits us is deplorable.
Limitation makes the creative mind inventive.
There is no limit to what can be accomplished if it doesn't matter who gets the credit.
Language helps form the limits of our reality.
There are no limitations to any of our dreams.
Beyond the limit of pain, it is longer painful.
A man who limits his interests, limits his life.
Every limit is a beginning as well as an ending.
The only limits are, as always, those of vision.
Everyone has limits. Not everyone accepts them.
